---
title: External Validity
---

Population
- Is the study sample representative of the general clinical population?
    - Sampling Method: Consecutive (least biased) > Random > Convenience (most biased)
- Does my patient meet study inclusion/exclusion criteria?
- Assume convenience if not stated

Setting

- Similar clinical setting?
- Similar/feasible level of therapist training?

Assessment/Treatment

- Similar/feasible assessment or treatment protocol?
- Technological advances in assessment/treatment since publication?
